instructions: On your Android phone or tablet, open the Gmail app . Open the email message. Tap Download .
On your Android phone or tablet, open the Gmail app . Open the email message. Touch and hold the photo. Tap View image . Tap the photo. In the top right, tap More . Tap Save .
On your Android phone or tablet, open the Gmail app . Open the email message. Tap Save to Drive . When the message is saved, you'll see "Saved to Drive" on your screen.
